name: TENNESSEE BUSINESS FORUM
sampleDescriptions: Promotes economic activities of businesses and non-profit organizations in Tennessee.
Promotes economic activities of businesses and non-profit organizations in Tennessee, including discussions related to area wage index, appropriations, tax and trade issues.
